title: The Rivers
creator_credit: Trevor Ling, Nina Syme and Victorian Film Corporation
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Victoria the Garden State”.
Since the Industrial Revolution Western man has harnessed rivers to his needs as a producer. By an historical co-incidence the ravages of industrialisation by-pass most of the 13,750 miles of rivers in Victoria.
